abilities.description: Your jet pack allows you to hover mid-air, make jet-assisted leaps, or fly over short distances. It has a max of 5 fuel and can be refueled on your command vehicle. When you make a move using your jet pack to overcome an obstacle or gain a better position, add +2 and suffer -1 fuel.
When you make a move reacting to an imminent threat by rapidly relocating using a burst from your jet pack, boost and suffer -1 fuel.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3ff03b51f620ab26]{Undertake an Expedition} (+edge) across difficult terrain assisted by your jet pack, suffer -1 fuel and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit with a match, you surge ahead. Mark progress.
